Here is the list of signs with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural-born leaders, Aries are often bold and adventurous.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - Practical and down-to-earth, Taurus can be stubborn at times.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and curious, Geminis are natural communicators.
4. Cancer - 7/10 - Emotional and nurturing, Cancers value close relationships.
5. Leo - 8.5/10 - Confident and charismatic, Leos can be dramatic at times.
6. Virgo - 6.5/10 - Analytical and practical, Virgos are often overcritical.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic and social, Libras value harmony and balance.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpios are private and perceptive.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians can be blunt at times.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Ambitious and disciplined, Capricorns can be perfectionistic.
11. Aquarius - 7.5/10 - Humanitarian and independent, Aquarians value individuality.
12. Pisces - 8.5/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, Pisces are often dreamy and sensitive.
Note: The scores are subjective and based on general astrological interpretations of each sign's characteristics.
